thread.title: Uber Scores U.K. Legal Victory
thread.title_full: Uber Scores U.K. Legal Victory - WSJ

author: Amir Mizroch
title: Uber Scores U.K. Legal Victory
text:
Uber Technologies Inc. scored a victory in the U.K. on Friday as the London High Court ruled that the ride-sharing company wasn’t breaking the law through its app, which calculates a fare based on the time and distance of the ride.
Transport for London, the city’s transportation regulator, had previously said Uber’s app wasn’t a taximeter, but...
